artist: Attributed to Jacques Courtois (called Borgognone); Attributed to Guglielmo Cortese
medium: Black and white chalk on blue paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, June 22, 1982, part of no. 349, for £122.65, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1982-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Man Fallen from Horse, Study for Conversion of Saint Paul or Battle of Constantine (recto); Study of a Hand (verso)
